lines.text: Put it out that cigarette, Gennadi Ivanovitch.
But I'm not even smoking it, Akiva Israelovitch.
lines.character: Stepan Ivanovitch Kerossian - l'équipe de Liebskind

lines.text: It's a threat to me, I suppose. In chess, the threat is stronger than the execution.

[after a long pause while both are playing chess]
Still enjoy winning from me?
lines.character: Stepan Ivanovitch Kerossian - l'équipe de Liebskind

lines.text: I taste the sweet victories and I taste the bitter defeats.
